body: My stupid ass from two years ago sounding stupid as ever.

I don't wish to be horny anymore
I just wanna be Happy....

todas fueron violados y se acostaron con otros hombres para que este al final se hiciera cargo de los hijos que ellas tuvieron con otras personas vaya que desarrollo increíble wao es la mejor superación de personaje que jamas he visto.

They said pregnant this pregnant that, but never i see a pregnant sex, or fuck even a pregnant belly i never see it...
What a let down...
But it seems the Mizuho bitch got pregnant at another series or maybe that's only a alternate route.
Search Cum Depository School...
If it's a part of next chap, then i think that boi would be NTR'ed to the bone.

Pretty good since he fought in some way to get his girls back and like everyone else kinda mad about the sister lets just hope the douche bag guy converts AND Junko really is into nuns...... The nun was boring since there really was no back story she just came outta no where with the slightest connection to the mc like other girls. I was also expect chapter 8 for years but seems like it wont happen

Its a horrible conclusion nonetheless, even with this story showing so much promisse. Its really a shame that the author didn't pick up this story in the last 4 years. One can only fanfic about a true good ending for this story (or a really bad one if you're the NTR loving type).
This author doesn't seem release much stuff, but I still hope that he will come back to finish this properly.
So if you are reading this comment right after finishing chapter 4 to check if Aoi came back, yeah she didn't... yet. Yeah I know the story had potential but we can only hope the author comes back to finish what he started.
Junko Affairs is such a butthurt vanillafag bitch LOL
Make a number 8 9 10 and so on

What pisses me off is the open ended ending. it COULD have been a happy ending with another volume. But NOPE cliffhanger. We'll never see the results with his sister. we'll never see whats up with the nun.  We'll never see the end to anything. that's the worst part to me. I hate incomplete stories =/
@junko affairs the only thing that pissed me off the most was the sister part.

AND WTF happened to the Nun from the previous stories???? JUST FUCK THIS FUCK THIS FUCK THIS FUCK THIS FUCK THIS series. Unexplained ass stories and shit. This Trash has given me a headache. FUCK this series man.

Garbage series Ruined my whole week, FUCK this author. It's a shame too I was enjoying the old style of artwork. Until the 2nd book then everything went to hell. HOW DO YOU EXPECT ME TO ENJOY A STORY IF IM RIPING MY HAIR OUT? Fucking gay ass author.
